intro: Pyxa speciosa, commonly known as the showy pyxie, is a species of flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. Pyxa speciosa thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is often found in desert scrub and chaparral habitats. Its ornamental value has made it a subject of interest in horticulture, though it is not widely cultivated.
